data.event: In 1903, Nagpartian was then fused with the Municipality of Bangui because of the unstable condition due to low collection of government taxes.

event.title: February 28, 1914, by virtue of a legislative act, Nagpartian was renamed

data.event: On February 28, 1914, by virtue of a legislative act, Nagpartian was renamed Burgos in honor of one of the three martyred priest, Fr, Jose Burgos.
